title: About
body:
Familiar with PHP including CodeIgniter, WordPress, Laravel.
Know a little about frontend and have experience with container.
Now I am using Golang most of the time. And studying for AWS services.
Make some small tool in my free time.
Feel free to contact me via LinkedIn. I wanna have some foreign friends.
Love Japanese culture after I star watching Vtuber.
If you want to talk about that, please do not hesitate to contact me.
